attributes.action: Ensure the return of British Sailors and Royal Marines by all means possible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On Friday 23rd March, 15 members of the British Armed Forces were in action patrolling Iraqi territioral waters and were carrying out anti-smuggling duties. They were siezed against Iraqi and International Law by the Iranian Revolutionary Guard and have been taken to an undisclosed locale and have not been heard of since.

The British Government should not take any measure of the table and be ready and prepared to use absolutely any means necessary to ensure the return of our forces taken hostage, the British Government both direct and indirect should be handing Tehran the most terribly blunt terms about why this situation doesn't bode well for them, considering the precarious position that the world considers them to be in.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
